The Time Traveler's Button: This button has the power to pause time, allowing the user to freeze the present moment and explore the past or future without any consequences. The user can choose to pause time for a specific duration or indefinitely, providing endless possibilities for adventure and discovery.

The Button of Infinite Possibilities: This button has the power to create endless scenarios and possibilities, allowing the user to experience a never-ending variety of outcomes. With just one press, the user can find themselves in a new reality, where they can explore different careers, relationships, or even entire lives.

The Button of Time Reversal: This button has the power to reverse the flow of time, allowing the user to undo mistakes or relive precious moments. The user can choose to reverse time for a specific duration or indefinitely, providing the opportunity to correct past mistakes or relive cherished memories.

The Button of Alternate Realities: This button has the power to transport the user to alternate realities, allowing them to experience different versions of reality. With just one press, the user can find themselves in a parallel universe where they can explore different versions of themselves and their surroundings.

The Button of Eternal Youth: This button has the power to grant the user eternal youth, keeping them looking and feeling young forever. The user can choose to use the button for a specific duration or indefinitely, providing the opportunity to enjoy a life free from the burdens of aging.
